title: Flag of Albania
cardDescription: The Flag of Albania is a red flag with a silhouetted black double-headed eagle in the center.
description: The Flag of Albania is a red flag with a silhouetted black double-headed eagle in the center. The red stands for bravery, strength and valor, while the double-headed eagle represents the sovereign state of Albania.

content.content: Size of this pattern is just enough to get some details of the double-headed eagle visible. Whether the finished silhouette looks enough like the original though, is in the eye of the beholder.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 28, Sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sba, sab, sc  1, sba, sc 2, sab, sc 1, sba, sab, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 8, sab, sba, sab, sc 1, sba, sab, sc 1, sba, sab, sba, sc 9, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, [sab, sc 2, sba] x 3, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 9, sab, sc 6, sba, sc 10, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 10, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 9, sab, sc 6, sba, sc 10, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 3, sba, sab, sba, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sba, sab, sba, sab, sc 2, sba, sab, sba, sab, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 10, [sab, sba] x 3, sc 11, turn
Ch 1, sc 11, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 12, sab, sba, sc 13, turn

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
